dialogues.text: Spider... Mike... Spider... Ashley sees her stun gun is on   the dresser. She lunges for it. She's almost got it.     The spider squirts two lines of gummy web at Ashley.    The glop hits her int he chest, carries her backward.    Glues her to the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chris finishes   dressing. He faces Sam. There is an odd moment as they   find themselves standing close. If the circumstances   were different they'd probably end up kissing. And    then they hear ASHLEY'S bloodcurdling SCREAM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mike pops out of his door. Sam and Chris run down the hallway. Sam yanks open the door to Ashley's room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sam, Chris and Mike stand in the doorway staring at a giant spider menacing Ashley. The spitter fires another webby blast, sticking the girl's legs to the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow!   A scytodes spitter! Chris pushes past Sam and Mike. He grabs a chair and shoves it at the spitter like a lion tamer. The spider backs off. Sam takes off running down the hallway. ASHLEY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are you going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sam runs up to find a gun case. She tries to get a shotgun, but finds it locked. She doesn't have the key. Sam grabs objects in the room and smashes the gun rack to pieces.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chris has the chair in one hand to fend off the spider. With the other hand he tries to get Ashley out of the webbing. Mike stands nearby reading from his Cassiopeia. MIKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The scytodes spits a gooey discharge to immobilize their prey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No shit! The spider hits Chris's chair with a blast of webbing. The chair is blown from his hand, and stuck to the wall. Chris stands weaponless before the spider. ASHLEY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Use my stun g... Ashley is nailed in the face with another blast of goo. Mouth sealed shut. Chris reaches under the bed and pushes it over on to the spitter. The spider leaps clear onto the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (reads)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Watch its fangs! The spitter's fangs move from side to side as it fires!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll keep that in mind. Chris grabs the spitter from behind and drags it off the wall. The spider turns to fight. Chris wrestles it to the ground. He sees the fangs begin to move from side to side and rolls clear of a point-blank web shot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sam takes a purposeful step back and launches a spinning roundhouse kick that snaps the shotgun out of its binding. She grabs the bang stick and runs from the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chris puts himself between Ashley and the spider. He looks for a weapon. Lunges for the scissors, but the spitter nails him with a blast of glue. Chris is flung across the room and stuck to the wall by the sleeve of his shirt. He shrugs out of it and makes another grab for his scissors. He gets them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get under it! Stab it in the abdomen! They don't have any armor down there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How am I supposed to do that!? The spider leaps at Chris... and EXPLODES in midair. Bits of gore shower Chris. He stands to see Sam in the door with her shotgun. Chris is covered in spider guts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm gonna need some new pants.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sam finishes loading new shells into her shotgun and then pops a fresh clip into her 9mm. Chris comes out of the garage wearing clean clothes. Sam chucks him the pistol.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ever used one of these?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm a fast learner. Chris tries to put the gun in his pocket. And then his waistband. But these damn pants are too tight. Ashley uses scissors to cut web out of her hair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I told you! I told you all!     But nobody ever listens to Mike! Still think I'm crazy, Mom?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry I didn't believe you. Ashley is about to hyperventilate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Calm down, baby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There aren't enough wine coolers in the world to calm me down!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I won't let anything happen to you. Sam ka-chacks a fresh round into her shotgun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What other spiders did Joshua have?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Spitters, jumpers, orb weavers, tarantulas...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why couldn't he keep goldfish like a normal person? Sam checks the phone.     It's dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We need to warn people.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How about the radio station?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good one.    We'll go to Harlan's.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Outside?    You want to go outside?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chris and Sam open the front door of the house. looks one way. Chris the other. No giant spiders lurking about. Chris and Sam continue onto the lawn. Mike and Ashley watch from the safety of the doorway. They listen to the comforting SOUNDS OF a SUMMER NIGHT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's okay... Mike and Ashley move out of the doorway.          Joining adults. They move toward the cop car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cop car cruises. The occupants peer out the windows. Everything appears normal. Although no people are visible.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sam, Chris, and the kids move away from the cop car to the door. They are at the far end of town. All appears to be normal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harlan is broadcasting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... I'm saying the invasion has already occurred. The aliens are among us. But they've taken common forms. They hide in plain sight. Harlan is startled as Sam and the others enter with guns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We need to make an emergency broadcast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Giant spider invasion. Harlan's jaw drops.    Sam takes the microphone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you going to say?   You can't tell them the truth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into microphone)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is this thing on? Hello? This is Sam Palmer. We have an emergency situation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A pack of rabid coyotes is loose in town. Wolf spiders crawl across rooftops. Spitters scale buildings Tarantulas lurk in the shadows. Jumpers scuttle out of the mineshafts. Trapdoors prepare their burrows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This funky old couple relaxes in their LaZee-Boys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They are extremely dangerous. The forelegs of a tarantula reach over the top of the man's recliner, yanking him clean out. The woman is oblivious as her husband is dragged away across the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emma bursts out of the front door, screaming hysterically. Hank is behind her with the SawzAll. A wolf spider crawls after them from inside the house.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arm yourselves with any weapons you can find. Hank raises the saw, overextending the power cable.   He loses power. Drops the saw and runs for his life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Floyd and Leroy use brooms to fend off several wolf spiders. SAM (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay together and head for the mall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A spider eats the chef. The waitress roller-skates away from an arachnid. She jumps through the window into the street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A family piles into their mini-van. Oblivious to the jumper hiding in the "way back." They close the door and drive off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harlan has donned a vintage football helmet and pads.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The mall? SAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The walls are concrete and the exits have steel gates. We could hold an entire army of giant spiders from inside. ASHLEY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You just said giant spider on the air. Sam sees the microphone is keyed. HARLAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now that's great radio! SAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not giant spiders!      I meant to say... Harlan notices long spider legs passing the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The aliens!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sam and the    others spill out of the trailer. They head for the cop    car. As they get closer, a wolf spider climbs onto    the car's roof and gnaws on the light bar. Sam raises    her gun to blast it. MIKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait, Mom! The noise will attract more of them! CHRIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's try for the mall. Sam leads the others toward town.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chris and Sam hang onto the panicked kids. Harlan brings up the rear. The place is chaos. People are chased by spiders. Dragged by spiders. Killed by spiders. Eaten by spiders. CHRIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My truck's at the museum.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your keys? CHRIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In my other pants.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look out! The group flees a trio of goo-firing spitters.    Suddenl a familiar mini-van races past.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop!    Take us with you! Harlan tries to flag down the speeding ride but sees... The van's occupants are locked in combat with a jumper. The beast is inside their vehicle and tearing them to pieces. The van crashes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A group of orb weavers scurry across power lines. They hit a transformer, shorting it out. The entire town is suddenly plunged into darkness. Headlights. GUNFIRE. Moonlight. Spotty illumination for the arachnids' feeding frenzy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A dumpster. The lid rises slightly. Wade Hale peers out from within. He lifts the lid higher, oblivious to the wolf spider on top of it. The spider reaches down at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!     Please! The spider is suddenly BLOWN AWAY by Sam and Chris. climbs out of the dumpster.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you! Chris and Sam move on with the kids. Wade runs after them. Mike looks at garbage-covered Wade.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You stink. WADE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Ashley) Have you seen Bret? ASHLEY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He was out at the dunes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go ahead.    I've got your butt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your back!    I've got your back! Chris gives Sam a funny look.       Maybe Gladys was righ

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sam leads her group down toward the mall. Other groups of survivors do likewise. As they get closer to the mall the groups coalesce into one large pack. We recognize Deputy Pete. Fireman Travis. The roller-skating waitress. Floyd. Leroy. Hank. Emma. And many other locals.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sam and Chris are at the front of the mob with their kids.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Suddenly a trapdoor spider pops out of the ground. It grabs Travis the fire chief, and pulls him under, quickly replacing the roof of its den. TRAVIS SCREAMS underground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trapdoors!    They're all around us!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How can we spot them? Mike consults his Cassiopeia.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't download that part!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You dork! The group wheels at the MUFFLED SOUNDS. They see nothing. They hear another MUFFLED SCREAM, and the top of the spider's den pops up. Travis drags himself out of it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Help... me... please... He is dragged back underground. The group continues toward the mall entrance. Suddenly a gun-toting hunter is grabbed by a trapdoor. He goes cyclic, madly FIRING his GUN into the air as he's dragged under. More beasts rise out of their dens.       Reaching for th humans.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep going! Chris and the others flee toward the mall.          Some SHOOT at the spiders as they run. Leroy is grabbed by a trapdoor. Floyd tries to help but the spider plunges its fangs into poor Leroy, dragging him under. The group clears the trapdoor minefield. But some of the spiders have vacated their dens and are coming after them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chris and Sam and the kids lead just fifteen other survivors to the glass doors. The doors are locked. Wade pulls out a ring of fifty keys and fumbles with them desperately. ASHLEY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's someone inside! The group sees Norman the dope dealer janitor approaching out of the gloom. He's staring at them all curiously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're closed. Sam points her gun at him.   Norman raise his hands in shock. NORMAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait! I have a prescription! It's for my glaucoma! SAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Open this goddamn door!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, ma'am. Norman unlocks the door and lets the group in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The survivors hustle inside. They lock the glass doors behind them. The spiders are still coming. MIKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get away from the doors! NORMAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Be cool, little dude.     They're locked. MIKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Glass won't stop them! The spiders begin smashing through the glass doors. Chris and Sam SHOOT to keep them back. People flee into the mall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The gates!    Close the gates!

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Wade and Norman proceed to lower the slotted steel security gates. Only problem is: Sam and Chris are on the other side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mom!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hurry up! Sam and Chris see the gate coming down. They run for it and slide underneath just as the gate comes down. A massive trapdoor slams up against the metal. But the metal holds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut the other entrances! Norman and Chris run toward the opposite end of the mall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chris and Norman arrive. Spiders are SMASHING through the GLASS. Chris and Norman bring the gate down. They back away as more spiders slam against the steel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trick or treat. Chris and Norman head back to join the others.   They find...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The survivors gather makeshift weapons. Floyd take a chainsaw off the wall. Norman practices swinging a heavy sledgehammer, accidentally toppling a stack of paint cans. Hank stands before a display of circular buzz saws. Chris goes to where Sam doles out the few firearms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're sealed up at both ends. Sam hands Chris a shotgun.    He tries to get the feel of it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You pump the slide to jack in a fresh round. Point at your target and squeeze.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Chris tries it out, pumping the slide. A shell flies out the slide of the weapon and hits Wade in the head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Watch it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like that? Sam shakes her head and takes the gun back.       She pul machete off the wall and hands it to Chris.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Try not to cut yourself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The place has the feeling of a fortress under a siege. Separate groups of townspeople are stationed at the entrances to watch the spiders' every move.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why didn't we see them earlier?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For the last time! They can't handle the sunlight. They were waiting in the mines for the sun to go down!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then at daybreak they'll go back inside. We can walk out the front door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We won't make it that long.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're gonna come in after us?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're growing very fast. They need food to sustain that kind of development.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Someone should go out and get help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You go, Sam.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're the sheriff.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't have that many handcuffs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about the police radio?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not goin' back out there, Pete. None of us are.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Radio Shack is full of cell phones.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But the signal won't get out of the valley. That's why we couldn't sell any of the damn things.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My antenna... The group looks up. The moon-cast shadow of the antenna is visible on the skylights that run the length of the mall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I could climb up to the top. I bet I could get a signal out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Great idea.    You should do that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll cover you, Harlan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wade leads Chris and Harlan toward an access door. Sam stands with her kids. Watching. Chris looks over his shoulder for one last look. Sam runs up to him, gives him the shotgun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you sure you can handle this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (re: pants)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: While I'm gone, do you think you could find me a size 32?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll do my best. (a beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uhh... Do you want to go out sometime?  Dinner? Maybe a movie? Chris takes her in his arms and plants a kiss on her lips. Wade holds open the nearby access door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, loverboy... you've got a town to save. Chris and Harlan head out. Sam watches them disappear through the door and then returns to the survivors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not really going to get him bigger pants are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wade leads Chris and Harlan up a tight staircase. The door at the top is identified as "Roof Access." Wade reaches the door. The others bunch up behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't even think about locking this door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll be right here waiting. Wade slowly opens the roof door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chris and Harlan step onto the roof with their gear. sign of any spiders.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Wade closes the door behind them and locks it.       Chri Harlan aren't happy to hear that LOCK TURN. They sneak across the roof toward the base of the antenna.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It looks clear. Harlan starts climbing. Chris stands guard at the bottom. Neither of them sees the horde of spiders climbing up the side of the building toward the roof.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mike collects perfume. Packing it into his pockets like grenades. Ashley is nearby, checking out the lingerie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't know you wore cologne.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't.   It's spider repellent. Sam steps in through the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's stay together, guys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (holds up a teddy)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can I get this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Move it! The kids run out to join their mom.       After they go.. The grill of an air vent is pushed open. A huge spitting spider pushes its way through. Dropping to the floor. Another spider follows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harlan is high up on the antenna. He has a cell phone in hand. It still indicates: "NO SERVICE." He keeps climbing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chris sees spiders flood onto the roof.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've got company! He tries to COCK the SHOTGUN.        Ejecting a shell out side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This always looks so easy on TV! Chris gets it figured out just in time to BLAST an attacking spider. He fades back toward the antenna. SHOOTING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harlan checks the phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've got a signal! He dials 911.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chris is surrounded by spiders.        He starts climbing the antenna.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're coming!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harlan is on the phone.       He hears...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 911 Emergency.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm calling from Prosperity Nevada! We're being attacked by giant spiders! The entire town has been overrun! Chris yells up to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!   Don't say that!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is Emergency Services. Not dial-a-joke.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: CLICK. The LINE GOES DEAD. Chris climbs up beside him. He FIRES several BLASTS at the approaching spiders.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They didn't believe me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What a shock!     Try again! The spiders are closing in as Harlan re-dials.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 911 Emergency.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There was a massive explosion! Everybody's dead!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, your number has been flagged as a source of a crank call. I'm afraid I must terminate this conversation. CLICK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She hung up on me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Climb! Chris FIRES the SHOTGUN.       The spiders are closing in

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sam gazes up at the skylight. She can see the silhouette of Chris and Harlan climbing the antenna. Pursued by spiders.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sotto)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my God... Ashley screams in horror nearby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're inside!

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Sam whirls to see Ashley pointing at several spiders coming out of Victoria's Secret. Sam runs over to fight them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Over here! He faces off against more spiders coming through the Home and Garden store.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harlan is at the top. Chris is a bit lower. The spiders are still coming. Chris SHOOTS at them. His GUN RUNS DRY. He flips it around and butt-strokes an approaching arac. A spider fires a web at Harlan.       Nails the poor guy. drags him off the antenna. Harlan falls off the antenna, back toward the spiders. Chris reaches out and grabs him. Holding Harlan's hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've got you! Harlan makes eye-contact with Chris.       They're both a to be killed unless...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Defend the human race!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! Harlan jerks away from Chris's hand. He cannonballs down into the horde of spiders. Splattering several of the beasts along with himself. Chris throws the useless shotgun at an approaching arac and climbs even higher. He pulls out his machete and begins hacking at the guide-wires that hold the antenna upright. The spiders close in. Chris slices one wire. The antenna quivers. Chris slices another wire. The antenna shakes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deputy Pete is standing with Sam and the kids when he's jerked off his feet and hauled into the maw of an arachnid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ashley!   Mike! She sees Mike and Ashley avoid an arac by taking refuge inside the tunnels of the jungle gym. Sam FIRES the GUNS like Annie Oakley, putting spiders down left and right, trying to reach her kids. Floyd the barber confronts a spider with his chain-saw.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Having a bad hair day?! The spider charges.     Floyd slices its legs off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How about a little off the top! He slices another arac.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chris dodges a spider's webline.       Several more come him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're going down! Chris cuts the last wire and hikes out over the skylight. The antenna keels over. Chris hangs tight as he drops toward the glass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sam looks up to   see Chris come crashing down through th skylight on the   antenna. The antenna tilts in at a sixt degree angle.    Chris hangs off the end. Orb weavers rid their weblines   down to the floor of the mall. Mike peeks out from the top of the jungle gym. He sees a hundred spiders coming in on webs. Flooding out of the stores. The devil-spawned monsters are everywhere!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arac attack! Chris leaps from the antenna to a nearby web. He slides down it like a pole, squashing the orb weaver at the bottom. Sam runs to his side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you get help?!    Is anybody coming!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're on our own! Sam tosses him a gun and they head toward the jungle gym. The waitress roller-skates away from the spiders. She slaloms clear of several spitters. But gets tackled by a jumper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ashley and Mike are hiding.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't stay in here! Ashley starts to move out   of the tube. She discovers th end has been covered with   web. She pushes it. Something on the other side pushes   back. Ashley scrambles back. Mike is already moving.    The kids flee through the tube to get away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are they doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (checks Cassiopeia)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're trapping us like ants in a log! Once they have all the exits blocked, they'll come in through the last one! They see a way out, head for that exit, only to find a spider coming through it. Mike tosses one of his perfume grenades at the spider, covering their retreat. Another spider comes after them through one of the tubes. Mike chucks another perfume bottle. The spider cowers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've gotta go! Ashley finds a hole that leads to the slide.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here! She starts down with Mike close behind. A large spider looms at the end. Ashley tries to arrest her slide. But it's no use. At the last second Sam's boot kicks the arachnid clear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ashley and Mike pour out of the slide. Chris and Sam finish off the spider and then run with the kids. Emma runs parallel to them across the playground's sandbox. Only to be yanked under by a trapdoor spider. Hank sees this and goes after the spiders with all his tools. Getting revenge with a nail gun in each hand. HANK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's tool time! Floyd is still going crazy, slicing spiders with his chain-saw, he lets out a victorious yell until a hungry spider descends on him from above and knocks him to the floor. Chris passes a clothing store displaying Levi 501s.    He stops for a moment to look at the jeans. SAM (O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chris! Chris continues on. All of the survivors meet in the middle of the mall and prepare for Custer's last stand. Spiders charge from all directions. Mike throws his perfume grenades. Sam and Chris SHOOT. Others use their make-shift weapons. Norman pulls out a joint and sparks it.    Mike sees this and gets an idea. MIKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where do you grow your weed?! NORMAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dude, if I tell you, I have to kill you. Norman takes a hit on his reefer. MIKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're going to kill us, you stoner! Norman sees the army of spiders closing in. NORMAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Over here!

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Norman opens    an access door. Sam and the other survivo run over and    crowd through it. Norman shuts the door behind them.     The groups of pursuing spiders collide a begin ripping    each other to pieces in a feeding frenzy

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Norman leads the survivors down the tight hallway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are you taking us?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To Shangri-la.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Norman leads the survivors into a basement room full of pot paraphernalia. Hookahs. Weed growing in hydroponic units under battery powered lights. Psychedelic posters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You aren't going to arrest me for this are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not today. The group can hear SPIDERS BASHING at the upstairs door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Norman)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh great! Now you've trapped us! Chris moves to the bottom of the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We should be able to hold them off for a little while. Suddenly a loud BANGING ERUPTS on the wall behind them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're coming through the wall! The group tightens up. Back to back. Ready for the end. Suddenly a human hand punches through the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell?

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Bret Hale rips through the drywall. Filthy but alive. Standing in a horizontal mine shaft. He sees Sam's gun pointed right at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't touch her!     I swear! Sam looks at Ashley.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't waste your bullets. Wade embraces his son.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought you were a goner, boy! Chris steps to the opening for a closer look at the mine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can get out this way!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aren't the spiders in there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not until daylight. The BANGING on the upper door gets more INTENSE. Norman grabs a flashlight and a bunch of battery powered grow lights from his weed farm. He passes them out to the group. Chris takes the flashlight and leads the way into the mine shaft. Bret is shocked as the others follow him. The group uses the grow lights, and flashlights.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're going back in there?!       Are you all crazy!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, Bret!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No way!   I'm not going! Bret is alone in the room as the upper DOOR IMPLODES and spiders flood downstairs. Bret dives through the opening.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bret runs past Sam and Chris. Sam FIRES her SHOTGUN at the first spider that enters the tunnel. Her GUN CLICKS DRY. She un-holsters her PISTOLS and FIRES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cover me! SAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you going to do?! Chris uses the machete to cleave into the tunnel's upper support beam. More spiders come into the tunnel. Sam FIRES desperately. Chris keeps on hacking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hurry! Sam's GUNS CLICK DRY. Spiders charge. Chris swings the machete hard. The ROOF COLLAPSES onto the attacking spiders. Chris and Sam leap back. Landing in a heap. Clouds of dust swirl around them. They are tangled up for an awkward beat. Their faces just inches from each other... SAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold that thought. They manage to disengage and move on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chris and Sam move toward the bobbing lights of the few remaining survivors. WADE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're trapped again! CHRIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At least they can't follow us. SAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Which way do we go? CHRIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think we're in one of the old tunnels. SAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can you get us out of here? CHRIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry, Sam. Chris takes point with the others following nervously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A boarded-up shaft entrance. Suddenly the WOOD SPLINTERS. Chris and the others bash through. They file into a slightly more open area with two branching tunnels. The place is stacked from floor to ceiling with barrels of toxic waste. CHRIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't believe it... Mike recognizes the BioHazard warning label he saw on the barrel in the drainage ditch. MIKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've seen one of these before!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are they?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toxic waste. SAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where did you see it, Mike? MIKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The creek where Joshua gets his spider food. There was one in the water. Chris starts toward the sloping tunnel. CHRIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can get out this way! BRET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, we can't. (turns to Wade) Isn't that tunnel blocked off, Dad? Chris and the others look at Wade. WADE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh... yeah... he's right.   We can't get out that way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You did this? WADE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I knew you'd never sell... We're under my property so...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You put all of us at risk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't have a choice! I was broke! They gave me a hundred grand! Sam punches him.     Knocking Wade to the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think our lives are worth a little more than that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're wasting time. Chris heads toward the only exit available. The others follow. Wade staggers to his feet. Stumbling after them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chris leads the group down a tunnel. They come across bits of vintage mining gear. A string of old light bulbs runs along the roof into both tunnels.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One end of these lights should be connected to a generator. That'll be near the entrance. They continue down the tunnel.     Entering...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A large cavern. Animal carcasses litter the ground. Some human remains. Dead pets. Dead ostriches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My birds! You see, Sam? I wasn't lying! That's what I can put on the insurance form... giant spiders!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ewww... what's that smell? The others are reacting strongly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Methane.   This cavern is full of gas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What does that mean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One spark and we're all dead. Norman swallows his glowing joint. Chris shines his flashlight on a pile of mummy bundles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's what I was talking about, Chris. Presents from the male tarantula to the female.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So the female's around here? Bret looks around nervously. The group moves closer. They sine their lights on a horrifying sight. Joshua's corpse is a deflated flesh balloon. Yellowed teeth sneer from a shattered skull. He's completely desiccated. Every ounce of liquid drained away. Mike hides his eyes.     Ashley comforts him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That one just moved! Chris runs over and slices it open with his machete. web comes away to reveal a human hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's somebody in here! Chris cuts away more web as the other survivors help. They finally reveal Gladys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gladys! The woman's body begins to spasm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gladys, please... (to the others)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can anybody help her?!

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Suddenly Ashley pushes her way forward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her breathing is shallow.       She's going into arrest. Ashley proceeds with CPR. Just like she saw on TV. Suddenly Gladys snaps out of it. Gasping for air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's okay.    It's okay. Gladys starts to get a grip. Trying to focus on Chris. From this angle Chris look like he has a golden halo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Am I... dead?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not in heaven?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then what's with all the gold? Gladys points behind Chris's head to the wall of the cavern. The group turns their lights on it. The reflection is dazzling. Veins of gold criss-cross the cavern walls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gold! Gold!     Look!    It's everywhere!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is it real? Chris checks it out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesus... it's the mother lode... He was right. My dad was right... Chris helps Gladys to her feet.         They share an emo look of recognition.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So were you.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Wade chips away at the gold.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get as much as you can! Bret looks at Ashley.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice work, Doc. Ashley acknowledges him. Bret chips gold with Wade. puts her hand on Ashley's shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You saved my life. Ashley smiles. Gladys leans over to Norman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have you got a smoke, kid?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The man says this cavern is full of highly flammable methane gas. I smoke to get high, not to die.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Spiders! The group sees a cluster of normal-sized tarantulas scuttling out of the shadows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's the big deal? Norman steps on the closest one, grinding it under his boot. He stomps around, crushing as many as he can. Mike watches this curiously. Taking a look at one of the squashed bodies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think you should stop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why? MIKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They don't have hair. They aren't fully grown tarantulas. Chris and Sam look over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're giant babies! Norman freezes. He hears SOMETHING MOVING around in the dark. And then a spine chilling... GROWL. Chris reacts to the noise.    He can guess what's coming. The FEMALE TARANTULA steps out of the shadows. Consuela has grown to be as big as a Volkswagen MicroBus. By far the largest spider we've seen yet. Covered in hair. Massive eyes. Her two fangs are the size of machetes. Mike's eyes go wide at the sight of his old nemesis.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Consuela.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Consuela? The fur on Consuela's back seems to undulate. There is something weird there. A lot of weird things. In fact... her entire back is littered with hundreds of baby tarantulas. As Consuela advances, she flicks several dart-sized quills off her belly right into Norman. A dark stain spreads across the drug dealer's shirt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bummer... Consuela pierces Norman with her fangs, holding him tight. Babies flood of her back and onto the doper, chewing him to pieces like ravenous piranhas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go! The group flees toward the opposite end of the cavern. male tarantula drops down to block their escape. Sam BLOWS it away. Wade and Bret are still chipping away bits of gold.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leave it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So you can keep it all!?   Hell no! Wade gets a nugget off the wall. He only has a nanosecond to admire it before Consuela suddenly looms behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dad! Bret reaches out toward his father. Wade reaches for him. Consuela's fangs suddenly protrude from Wade's chest and he's hauled backward. The tarantula flings Wade into the cave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bret, come on! Bret runs after the others. But he sees Consuela firing more quills at the group. Directly at Ashley. Bret leaps into harm's way. He's turned into a pin cushion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bret! Ashley goes to his side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry I... Bret dies.     Sam drags Ashley away from him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The survivors flee along the tunnel. Chris jumps up to rip down the string of light bulbs from the ceiling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have to get out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is our chance to kill them all. Chris smashes the bulb at the end of the strand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When the power comes on, the bulb will ignite the methane and torch them!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where did you get an idea like that!? Chris looks at Gladys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I blew up the kitchen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep going up the tunnel. There should be a generator at the exit. Start it up and await for my signal to throw the switch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And the toxic waste...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will be buried under tons of rock! Go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need to set the fuse as close to the spiders as I can. That should give us time to get clear. Sam and Chris share a brief beat. And then Chris pulls down the lights, dragging them back toward the tarantula's den.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He has a cute butt.    Don't you think?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: U.S.D.A. choice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chris comes through with his light bulb fuse. Consuela and her babies are feasting on the bodies of Bret and Wade Hale. Chris finds a vent in the ground.       He sprinkles dust it to identify a faint draft.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bingo. He positions the shattered light bulb beside this gas jet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mike helps Gladys up the tunnel. Sam and Ashley are behind. Suddenly a male tarantula steps out of the shadows, separating the groups.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mom!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep going! Sam and Ashley flee down another tunnel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chris finishes preparing the booby trap. He gets up to leave. Only to find Consuela coming toward him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hate spiders. Chris runs out of the cavern.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chris bails out of the cavern and starts running.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sam and Ashley flee the male tarantula. Sam stumbles over something on the ground. It's Bret Hale's lost motorcycle. Ashley looks back and sees the tarantula coming after them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hurry! Sam lifts the MOTORCYCLE upright and climbs on. She STARTS it and REVS the ENGINE. Ashley leaps aboard. Sam accelerates along the shaft, away from the spider. The bike's headlight illuminates their path. The male tarantula scurries after the bike. Sam rides the motorcycle along the shaft. Ashley hangs on tight. They've put some distance between themselves and the male tarantula. A dead-end looms before them. Ashley screams as her mom stops on a dime and does a 180. Sam rides back the way they came, heading straight toward the male tarantula. Ashley looks over her mother's shoulder at the giant spider coming in the opposite direction.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh shit.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Sam lifts the bike into a wheelie as the tarantula nears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Banzai! With perfect timing, she brings the front wheel down hard onto the tarantula's back. Crunch! The spider is roadkill. Sam steers them down another tunnel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mike and Gladys gather at a generator just shy of the tunnel exit. Mike tries to start the generator. It won't catch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It needs gas!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a ranch! Gladys heads over toward Wade's ranch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chris runs along the tunnel. Consuela charges after him, Chris reaches up, smashing more light bulbs as he runs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mike is at the generator as Sam and Ashley ride up on the motorcycle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It needs gas! Sam tips over the motorcycle, trying to get gas out of the tank. It's clear this is not going to work.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hurry!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chris runs.     Smashing light bulbs.   Consuela close behind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Start the generator!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's coming!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hurry, Mom! Sam has dumped some fuel into the generator.   She tries to start it. It won't turn over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chris ducks as Consuela fires quills at him.   He keeps going.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sam sees Chris at the bottom of the tunnel. She tries to start the generator again but it refuses to cooperate. CHRIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Throw the switch! SAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't have any power!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yo, Mom! Sam turns as Ashley throws her the STUN GUN. Sam catches it and brings it down to the light bulb cable... ZAPPING it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Chris runs, the light bulbs illuminate sequentially, traveling past him into the cavern.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A broken light bulb sparks. The filament ignites the gas-filled tunnel. A ball of flame spreads throughout the mines.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A huge column of flame blasts into the chamber. All the gold is illuminated. Consuela's babies are burned like popcorn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sam looks back to see Chris running toward her. Consuela is on his heels. The glow of a fireball is right behind them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on! Chris looks over his shoulder at Consuela and the flames.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chris! Chris makes it to Sam just ahead of the conflagration.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sam and Chris dive out of the mine opening. A pillar of flame shoots out behind them.   Ashley and Mike are nearby. The town is visible just a mile away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The spiders retreat from daylight. Scuttling back into the buildings. Heading down into the mine shafts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The chain reaction spreads through the mines.      Jets o flame blast up tunnels. Torching any unlucky spiders looking for a home. Rupturing the very earth around them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The EARTH BEGINS TO SHAKE VIOLENTLY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Earthquake! CHRIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! It's a chain reaction! The whole valley is going to blow! MIKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll never get out in time! Gladys drives up in     Wade's humvee.   Cigar in mouth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's get the fuck out of here! The survivors pile into the truck as the town begins to BLOW UP in the distance. Chris is just about to climb aboard when... A webline shoots out of the nearby mine shaft. Consuela lives! The spider is charred and bloody. But she's primed for revenge. Chris is yanked off his feet and hauled toward her. fumbles for his machete and hacks at the webline. Cutting himself free just before getting impaled on Consuela's fangs. Consuela knocks away Chris's machete and lunges down at him. Chris kicks her belly with both his feet. Consuela begins to shudder. Jagged cracks appear in her charred carapace. Chris kicks and tears at the failing armor. He thinks he's harming the tarantula, but he's actually helping it! Mike and the others watch from the humvee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh no... she's molting! Consuela's blistered shell cracks as she shrugs the damaged skin away from her body. Chris is amazed to see the spider has grown a full size larger and become totally rejuvenated! Consuela comes after Chris.        He defends himself wit machete. Shining steel makes contact with the dripping fangs. Once again Consuela punts away the machete. She prepares the death blow. It looks like curtains for Chris.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Consuela!   No!     Bad!   Bad Consuela! The massive spider stops in shock.            Chris looks see Mike has returned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The familiar multi-perspective spider vision. tarantula seems to recognize Mike.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO MIKE
dialogues.text: He throws his Cassiopeia PDA at the spider's face... Chris uses this moment of confusion to grab his machete and drive it deep into the spider's unprotected abdomen... The tarantula screams. Chris leaps up and runs, scooping up Mike.   They dive into the back of the humvee. Consuela tries to follow but is mortally wounded. She collapses in the dust. The TOWN EXPLODES in the b.g. The earth itself begins to collapse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gladys accelerates as the town sinks in the distance. BUILDINGS EXPLODE. Jets of flame burst upward. The mall is sucked into the widening pit of collapsing earth. The humvee is just a cart length ahead of a wave of crumbling desert.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The humvee reaches open road. The survivors watch out the back as Prosperity disappears into a massive sinkhole.

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: The group sits in a long beat of abject shock. And then Chris looks down to see his tight pants have finally ripped. CHRIS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I really need some pants that fit. The group smiles.    Happy to be alive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look out! Everyone looks to the road ahead. A familiar bunny rabbit hops across the highway. Gladys HONKS and swerves to avoid it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The bunny gets clear as the humvee drives away toward safety.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: The rabbit continues its trek for a moment, and then is grabbed by a large trap-door spider.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE END?
